All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Application
Main class for the Quiz Application.
ApplicationPanel
The ApplicationPanel class is responsible for rendering the quiz interface and handling the game logic, including: Displaying questions with multiple-choice options. Tracking the player's score. Managing a countdown timer for each question.
